name: Ragdoll Character Demo
description: This is a demonstration of a physics based character I made in about 4 hours in Unity. It is heavily inspired by NimSony's TinyGTA early prototype. The movement of the character might be a bit buggy and I might release some more updates to this project. It currently features a small space to play in and spawnable bot characters which simply stand up after a few seconds when they have been hit.
